snippet: The transaction was announced Friday by Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India during a state visit to France, even as the two countries continue to work on a stalled larger deal.
abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Mondi announces plan to buy 36 fighter jets from French company Dassault Aviation in effort to modernize India's air force; deal is not part of larger order of 126 jets that has been in works since 2012, stalled over questions of joint development.
lead_paragraph: The transaction was announced Friday by Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India during a state visit to France, even as the two countries continue to work on a stalled larger deal.

headline.main: France: India Agrees to Buy 36 Rafale Fighter Jets
headline.print_headline: Europe; France: India Agrees to Buy 36 Rafale Fighter Jets
